Package com.olegermolaev84.archive.core

Class Decoder

java.lang.Object
com.olegermolaev84.archive.core.Codec
com.olegermolaev84.archive.core.Decoder
public class Decoder
extends Codec
Unpacks files from the denoted stream and saves them into the specified directory (by default the current directory)

  • Method Details

    • setParentPath

      public void setParentPath​(java.nio.file.Path parrentPath) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Sets path to the directory the unpacked files to be stored to
      Parameters:
      parrentPath - path to the directory the unpacked files to be stored to
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - will be thrown in cases:
      -Denoted path does not exist
      -Denoted path is not directory
      -Denoted path does not have write permissions

    • unpack

      public boolean unpack() throws java.io.IOException
      Unpacks files from the input stream
      Returns:
      true if unpacking is performed successfully, otherwise false
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - will be thrown in case of IO errors

      Shutdowns executor and closes streams

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • submitTask

      private void submitTask​(SingleFileDecoder fileDecoder, java.util.concurrent.ExecutorCompletionService<java.lang.Void> service, java.lang.StringBuffer errors)
      Creates new Callable task for the given SingleFileDecoder. The task is responsible for unpacking and saving the file (or directory) to the output folder. Then the task is submitted into the ExecutorCompletionService
      Parameters:
      fileDecoder - initialized with compressed data SingleFileDecoder class object.
      service - ExecutorCompletionService
      errors - StringBuffer to collect error which can occur while the file unpacking.

    • readPackedData

      private SingleFileDecoder readPackedData() throws FileFormatException, java.io.IOException
      Reads next PathHeader and the compressed data. Creates and initializes SingleFileDecoder class object.
      Returns:
      SingleFileDecoder class object or null if EOF is reached
      Throws:
      FileFormatException - will be thrown if the input stream has corrupted format
      java.io.IOException - will be thrown in case of IO errors
